cs.IT, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.CR, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the construction and analysis of perfect codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves combinatorial designs and graph theory, which are subfields of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper discusses the construction of codes using combining constructions and product constructions, which are common techniques in coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also mentions lower bounds on the number of perfect codes, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR) and numerical analysis (cs.NA).
